[[Ron Ludington]],
Jeremy Allen |choreographer= [[Marina Zueva]],
Jill Casgrove |skating club= [[University of Delaware FSC]] |retired= |combined total= 141.39 |combined date= [[2007 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2007 World Juniors]] |SP score= 50.76 |SP date= [[2007 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2007 World Juniors]] |FS score= 90.63 |FS date= [[2007 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2007 World Juniors]] }} '''Bridget Namiotka''' (born January 3, 1990 in [[West Chester, Pennsylvania|West Chester]], [[Pennsylvania]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[pair skater]]. She teamed up with [[John Coughlin (figure skater)|John Coughlin]] in late 2004.{{cite news | url = http://www.skatetoday.com/2005/12/26/namiotka-and-coughlin-make-first-junior-grand-prix-final/ | title = Namiotka and Coughlin Make First Junior Grand Prix Final | last = Mittan | first = Barry | date = December 26, 2005 | publisher = SkateToday | accessdate = August 8, 2011}} They are the 2006 Junior national silver medalists. They announced the end of their partnership on July 3, 2007.{{cite web | url = http://www.usfigureskating.org/event_story.asp?id=39010 | title = Pairs Team Namiotka and Coughlin Announce End of Partnership | last = | first = |work = |publisher = [[U.S. Figure Skating]] | date = July 3, 2007 | accessdate = July 28, 2011 }} Namiotka has [[pancreatitis]]. ==Competitive highlights== ===Pairs=== (with Merrit) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event ! 2003 |- | [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]] || align="center" | 5th N. |} (with Coughlin) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event ! 2005-2006 ! 2006-2007 |- | [[World Junior Figure Skating Championships|World Junior Championships]] || align="center" | 4th || align="center" | 4th |- | [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]] || align="center" bgcolor="silver" | 2nd J. || align="center" | 9th |- | [[ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix Final]] || align="center" | 5th || align="center" | 6th |- | [[2006-2007 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix, Czech Republic]] || || align="center" bgcolor="CC9966" | 3rd |- | [[2006-2007 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix, Norway]] || || align="center" bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |- | [[2005-2006 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix, Croatia]] || align="center" bgcolor="gold" | 1st || |- | [[2005-2006 ISU Junior Grand Prix|Junior Grand Prix, Canada]] || align="center" | 4th || |} * N= Novice level; J = Junior level ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.figureskatersonline.com/namiotka-coughlin/ Official site] * {{isu name | id=00008909 | name=Bridget Namiotka}} * {{usfsa name | category=AthletePairBio | id=30812 | name=Bridget Namiotka}} * [http://www.caretoicedance.com/namiotka_coughlin.html Care To Ice Dance - Fansite] {{Persondata | NAME = Namiotka, Bridget | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = January 3, 1990 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Namiotka, Bridget}} [[Category:American pair skaters]] [[Category:1990 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Chester County, Pennsylvania]] {{US-figure-skating-bio-stub}}
